headline: Compared to Estimates, APA (APA) Q3 Earnings: A Look at Key Metrics
summary: While the top- and bottom-line numbers for APA (APA) give a sense of how the business performed in the quarter ended September 2025, it could be worth looking at how some of its key metrics compare to Wall Street estimates and year-ago values.

headline: Bank of America’s Akamine Remains Bearish on APA Corporation (APA), Cites High Operating Costs
summary: APA Corporation (NASDAQ:APA) is one of the 12 deep value stocks to invest in. On November 6, 2025, Bank of America Securities’ analyst Kalei Akamine maintained his “Sell” rating on APA Corporation (NASDAQ:APA) with a $20 price target. His bearish outlook stems from concerns over the company’s higher operating costs in the Permian Basin, North […]
